title: File Backup and Organizer Tool
overview: This was my undergrad summer internship project at TCS (Tata Consultancy Services). I independently developed a highly customized automated file backup tool in Java swings. With the ability to periodically backup a collection of folders in an easy to use tabbed interface, the tool was very customizable and was thus widely used in TCS. I also added an event scheduler to the software to prompt meeting reminders as I had completed the file backup segment well ahead of time.

images.caption: This shows a tab containing a folder structure and its file contents. Users had options to backup all the tabs and even choose individual files to backup.

The image shows a single 'Organizer' tab with the ability to add, edit and delete notify events as well as view all events in a simple calendar. Users could also send events to another person as long as he/she was on the same local area network.
